name: Rocky Reactor
description:
Rocky Reactor

Made in 72 hours.

An unstable reactor has been found in a nearby basement. It will be your task to capture it. It will be a bit risky since the reactor releases toxic fumes every so often. Be aware that our enemy is planning to do the exact same thing as us, so take them out when you see them!

Features
  • Stylish pixel art
  • Sweet voice lines
  • A pesky AI to play against
  • Local multiplayer
Units
  • Soldier - Does the most damage, not useful for much else.
  • Scientist - Has the ability to stabilize the reactor for a few more turns.
  • Saboteur - Has the ability to destabilize the reactor right away.
  • Snatcher - Has the ability to take over an enemy unit.
  • Smoker - Does not take damage when near the unstable reactor.
How to play Placing card

In order to place a card on the board, you have to drag the card from the side of the screen to an available tile in the spawn area. Available tiles will be marked with a dark round marker.

Movement

You can move a card on the board by dragging it from the current tile to an available tile. Available tiles will be marked with a dark round marker.

Abilities and Attacking

You can use your abilities and attack the same way as you would move your card. Scientist and saboteurs can only use their ability while next to the reactor. Snatchers can only use their ability while next to an available enemy.

Winning

You win the game by having more of your cards in the reactor's danger zone than the enemy for three turns in a row. 

Best of luck and I hope you have fun!
